'''Old-School Qi''' is an event [[NPC]] and [[Treasure Hoarder]] that appears in [[Dragonspine]] during the "[[To Thee My Tender Grief Confide]]" [[World Quest]] as part of the [[Lunar Realm]] event.

During the event, the player will fight him.
